cloth.name: Clothing
cloth.description: Offers minimal protection but is very light and flexible.

hide.name: Hide Armor
hide.description: Made from the tanned hides of animals, providing basic protection.

leather.name: Leather Armor
leather.description: Crafted from toughened leather, offering a balance of protection and mobility.

ring.name: Ring Mail
ring.description: Ring armor consists of interlocking metal rings, providing moderate protection.

studded.name: Studded Leather Armor
studded.description: Leather reinforced with metal studs, offering enhanced protection.

scale.name: Scale Mail
scale.description: Made of small metal plates sewn onto a backing, providing good protection.

chainmail.name: Chain Mail
chainmail.description: Made of interlinked metal rings, offering strong protection at the cost of weight.

banded.name: Banded Mail
banded.description: Consists of metal strips riveted to a leather backing, providing excellent protection.

splint.name: Splint Mail
splint.description: Made of vertical metal strips attached to a fabric or leather backing, offering high protection.

plate.name: Plate Mail
plate.description: Made of large metal plates that cover the body, providing the highest level of protection.

feathers.name: Feather Armor
feathers.description: Light armor made from layered feathers, offering minimal protection but great mobility.

chitin.name: Chitin Armor
chitin.description: Armor made from the hardened exoskeletons of insects or crustaceans, providing decent protection.

fist.description: A basic unarmed strike using the fists.

battleaxe.description: A heavy axe designed for powerful slashing attacks.

handaxe.description: A small handaxe suitable for throwing or close combat.

longbow.description: A bow designed for ranged combat with moderate draw weight.

shortbow.description: A shortbow that is easy to carry and quick to draw.

club.description: A simple wooden club, effective for basic melee combat.

dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close combat and throwing.

heavy_flail.description: A heavy rod with a spiked ball, designed for powerful strikes.

light_flail.description: A light rod with a spiked ball, suitable for quick strikes.

halberd.description: Combining an axe blade and a spear point on a long pole.

heavy_warhammer.description: A strong hammer designed for powerful crushing blows.

light_warhammer.description: A light hammer suitable for quick, precise strikes.

javelin.description: A thin spear designed for throwing.

lance.description: A heavy spear designed for mounted combat.

heavy_mace.description: A heavy rod with a solid head, designed for powerful strikes.

light_mace.description: A light rod with sturdy head suitable for quick strikes.

morningstar.description: A rod with a spiked head for piercing armor.

heavy_pick.description: A hardened tool designed for breaking through armor and shields.

light_pick.description: A light tool suitable for quick strikes and climbing.

pole_arm.description: A long-hafted pointed weapon for reach and leverage.

spear.description: A versatile thrown weapon also suitable for melee combat.

staff.description: A simple wooden rod used for defense and support.

quarterstaff.description: A reinforced wooden rod used for both offense and defense.

claymore.description: A large two-handed sword known for its powerful slashing attacks.

broadsword.description: A wide-bladed sword suitable for powerful slashes.

longsword.description: A versatile sword suitable for both cutting and thrusting.

scimitar.description: A curved sword designed for swift slashing attacks.

shortsword.description: A small sword ideal for close combat and quick strikes.

greatsword.description: A massive two-handed sword capable of dealing devastating damage.

falchion.description: A one-handed single-edged sword with a slightly curved blade that broadens toward the point.

cutlass.description: A short curved sword with a single cutting edge.

trident.description: A three-pronged spear used for fishing and combat.

sling.description: A simple throwing weapon used to hurl small stones or pellets.

heavy_crossbow.description: A bolt-firing mechanical ranged weapon known for its powerful piercing attacks.

light_crossbow.description: A bolt-firing mechanical ranged weapon known for its ease of use and quick reload times.

composite_bow.description: A bow reinforced for enhanced power and flexibility.

whip.description: A flexible weapon used for striking at a distance.

light_chain.description: A medium-weight whip used for flexible striking.

heavy_chain.description: A heavy whip used for powerful flexible striking.

rapier.description: A slender and sharply pointed sword designed for thrusting attacks.

bec_de_corbin.description: A polearm with a beak-like spike used for piercing armor.

voulge.description: A polearm with a broad and curved blade used for slashing attacks.

scythe.description: A polearm with a curved blade used for slashing attacks.

pike.description: A long spear used for thrusting attacks and keeping enemies at a distance.

greatclub.description: A heavy battering weapon used for powerful bludgeoning attacks.

glaive.description: A polearm with a broad blade used for slashing attacks.

katana.description: A fine sword with exquisite sharpness and cutting ability.

wakizashi.description: A fine short sword with exceptional sharpness and cutting ability.

naginata.description: A fine polearm with a curved blade used for slashing attacks.

kusarigama.description: A polearm attached to a sickle by a chain.

nunchaku.description: A battering weapon consisting of two sticks connected by a chain.

ale.description: A mug of frothy ale to quench your thirst after a long day of adventuring.

backpack.description: A sturdy backpack for carrying your gear on your adventures.

barrel.description: A large barrel for storing liquids or bulk goods.

bedroll.description: A comfortable bedroll for sleeping outdoors.

bell.description: A small bell that can be used to signal others or scare off wildlife.

blanket.description: A warm blanket for cold nights around the campfire.

boots.description: A sturdy pair of boots for trekking through rough terrain.

wine.description: A bottle of fine wine to celebrate a successful adventure.

box.description: A sturdy box for storing small items and valuables.

bracers.description: A pair of leather bracers for protecting your forearms in combat.

caltrops.description: A bag of caltrops that can be scattered on the ground to slow down pursuers.

candle.description: A simple wax candle that provides light in dark places.

canvas.description: A roll of canvas for making tents, sails, or other fabric items.

chain.description: A length of sturdy chain for securing items or climbing.

chalk.description: A piece of chalk for marking walls or drawing maps.

cloak.description: A warm cloak for protection against the elements.

crowbar.description: A sturdy crowbar for prying open doors or crates.

dice.description: A set of dice for gambling or passing the time.

doublet.description: A stylish doublet for formal occasions or impressing nobles.

firewood.description: A bundle of firewood for starting campfires.

flask.description: A small flask for carrying liquids.

fish_hook.description: A sharp fish hook for catching fish.

fishing_net.description: A sturdy fishing net for catching multiple fish at once.

flint_and_steel.description: A flint and steel for starting fires.

gloves.description: A pair of gloves for protecting your hands.

gown.description: An elegant gown for formal occasions.

hammer.description: A sturdy hammer for driving nails or breaking objects.

holy_symbol.description: A holy symbol for religious ceremonies or warding off evil.

hose.description: A length of hose for carrying water or other liquids.

iron_spikes.description: A set of iron spikes for securing tents or climbing walls.

ladder.description: A portable ladder for reaching high places.

lamp.description: An oil lamp that provides light in dark places.

lantern.description: A lantern that provides bright light for extended periods.

lock.description: A sturdy lock for securing doors or chests.

manacles.description: A pair of manacles for restraining prisoners.

mirror.description: A small mirror for signaling or personal grooming.

musical_instrument.description: A musical instrument for entertainment or rituals.

needle_and_thread.description: A needle and thread for repairing clothing or gear.

cloak_pin.description: A pin for securing a cloak in place.

piton.description: A metal spike for anchoring ropes in rock or ice.

pole.description: A long pole for support or investigation.

pot.description: A cooking pot for preparing meals while traveling.

pouch.description: A small pouch for carrying personal items.

quill.description: A feather quill for writing or drawing.

quiver.description: A quiver for holding arrows or bolts.

rations.description: A day's worth of dried food rations for sustenance on the road.

robe.description: A flowing robe for wizards or priests.

rope.description: A length of sturdy rope for climbing, tying, or securing items.

sack.description: A large sack for carrying bulky items.

satchel.description: A small satchel for carrying books or scrolls.

scrollcase.description: A protective case for carrying scrolls or maps.

shoes.description: A comfortable pair of shoes for everyday wear.

shovel.description: A sturdy shovel for digging or moving earth.

signal_whistle.description: A whistle for signaling allies or alerting to danger.

skillet.description: A cast iron skillet for cooking meals over a campfire.

soap.description: A bar of soap for personal hygiene while traveling.

spellbook.description: A book containing spells and magical knowledge for wizards.

tent.description: A portable tent for shelter while camping outdoors.

thieves_tools.description: A set of tools for picking locks and disarming traps.

torch.description: A wooden torch that provides light and can be used as a weapon.

tunic.description: A simple tunic for everyday wear.

twine.description: A ball of twine for tying or binding objects.

vellum.description: A sheet of vellum for writing or drawing.

vinegar.description: A bottle of vinegar for cooking or cleaning wounds.

holy_water.description: A vial of holy water that can harm undead creatures.

waterskin.description: A waterskin for carrying fresh water on long journeys.

whetstone.description: A whetstone for sharpening blades and tools.

wind_chime.description: A decorative wind chime that produces soothing sounds when the wind blows.

first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.description: A small kit containing bandages and salves for treating minor wounds.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: A small vial of clear liquid that neutralizes poison when consumed.

potion_of_barkskin.name: Potion of Barkskin
potion_of_barkskin.description: A vial of thick, green liquid that hardens the drinker's skin, providing additional protection.

minor_healing_potion.name: Minor Potion of Healing
minor_healing_potion.description: A vial of glittering red liquid that restores health when consumed.

major_healing_potion.name: Major Potion of Healing
major_healing_potion.description: A vial of glowing red liquid that restores a significant amount of health when consumed.

elixir_of_strength.name: Elixir of Strength
elixir_of_strength.description: A potent brew that temporarily enhances the drinker's physical strength.

oil_flask.name: Flask of Oil
oil_flask.description: A flask of slippery oil that can be thrown onto a surface or creature to make it more vulnerable to fire.

alchemist_fire.name: Alchemist's Fire
alchemist_fire.description: A sticky, flammable substance that ignites when exposed to air.

wand_of_cure_minor_wounds.name: Wand of Cure Minor Wounds
wand_of_cure_minor_wounds.description: A slender wand that can channel healing energy to mend minor wounds.

wand_of_paralyzing_touch.name: Wand of Paralyzing Touch
wand_of_paralyzing_touch.description: A slender wand that can deliver a paralyzing touch to a target.

wand_of_magic_missile.name: Wand of Magic Missile
wand_of_magic_missile.description: A slender wand that can fire magical darts of force energy at a target.

wand_of_polymorph.name: Wand of Polymorph
wand_of_polymorph.description: A slender wand that can transform a target into a different creature.

scroll_of_domination.name: Scroll of Domination
scroll_of_domination.description: A magical scroll that allows the caster to control the mind of a target creature.

scroll_of_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_of_fireball.description: A magical scroll that allows the caster to unleash a fiery explosion at a target location.

scroll_of_cure_disease.name: Scroll of Cure Disease
scroll_of_cure_disease.description: A magical scroll that can cure a target of any disease afflicting them.

scroll_of_apocalypse.name: Scroll of Apocalypse
scroll_of_apocalypse.description: An ancient scroll that unleashes catastrophic energy upon all enemies in the area.

ring_of_minor_protection.name: Ring of Minor Protection
ring_of_minor_protection.description: A simple enchanted ring providing slight protection

ring_of_protection.name: Ring of Protection
ring_of_protection.description: A magical ring that grants the wearer enhanced protection.

ring_of_major_protection.name: Ring of Major Protection
ring_of_major_protection.description: A powerful ring that provides significant protection to the wearer.

ring_of_regeneration.name: Ring of Regeneration
ring_of_regeneration.description: A mystical ring that slowly heals the wearer over time.

ring_of_thorns.name: Ring of Thorns
ring_of_thorns.description: A magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to counterattack.

ring_of_minor_strength.name: Ring of Minor Strength
ring_of_minor_strength.description: A simple enchanted ring providing slight strength boost

ring_of_strength.name: Ring of Strength
ring_of_strength.description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's physical strength.

amulet_of_health.name: Amulet of Health
amulet_of_health.description: A mystical amulet that bolsters the wearer's vitality.

amulet_of_focus.name: Amulet of Focus
amulet_of_focus.description: A powerful amulet that enhances the wearer's magical abilities.

amulet_of_protection.name: Amulet of Protection
amulet_of_protection.description: A protective amulet that increases the wearer's defenses.

crown_of_insight.name: Crown of Insight
crown_of_insight.description: An ornate crown that enhances the wearer's wisdom.

belt_of_giant_strength.name: Belt of Giant Strength
belt_of_giant_strength.description: A sturdy belt that enhances the wearer's physical strength.

boots_of_swiftness.name: Boots of Swiftness
boots_of_swiftness.description: Lightweight boots that increase the wearer's agility.

gloves_of_dexterity.name: Gloves of Dexterity
gloves_of_dexterity.description: Fine gloves that enhance the wearer's dexterity.

helm_of_intellect.name: Helm of Intellect
helm_of_intellect.description: A finely crafted helm that sharpens the wearer's mind.

mantle_of_charisma.name: Mantle of Charisma
mantle_of_charisma.description: An elegant mantle that enhances the wearer's charisma.

ring_of_the_firmament.name: Ring of the Firmament
ring_of_the_firmament.description: A celestial ring that grants the wearer resistance to elemental damage.

helm_of_the_stars.name: Helm of the Stars
helm_of_the_stars.description: A mystical helm that enhances all senses of the wearer.

ring_of_spell_turning.name: Ring of Spell Turning
ring_of_spell_turning.description: Improve all resistances and inflict damage back to caster on spell saves.

ring_of_perfect_turning.name: Ring of Perfect Turning
ring_of_perfect_turning.description: Grants high resistance to all damage types, and good chance to reflect spells back to caster.

wardstone.name: Wardstone
wardstone.description: A mystical stone that provides a protective barrier to the bearer.

ring_of_true_sight.name: Ring of True Sight
ring_of_true_sight.description: A magical ring that allows the wearer to see through illusions and invisibility.

longsword_of_flames.name: Longsword of Flames
longsword_of_flames.description: A longsword engulfed in magical flames, dealing extra fire damage on hit.

robe_of_elvenkind.name: Robe of Elvenkind
robe_of_elvenkind.description: A finely crafted robe that enhances the wearer's stealth and agility.

wooden_bowl.description: A simple wooden bowl, chipped and worn from use.

cloth_pouch.description: A small cloth pouch, frayed at the edges.

broken_dagger.description: A broken dagger with a dull blade and a cracked handle.

tattered_map.description: A tattered map with faded markings and torn edges.

wooden_figurine.description: A small wooden figurine, roughly carved and unfinished.

simple_ring.description: A simple iron ring, slightly bent out of shape.

small_statue.description: A small statue made of bronze, depicting a forgotten deity.

bronze_bracelet.description: A bronze bracelet with intricate designs etched into its surface.

faded_painting.description: A faded painting on canvas, its colors dulled by time.

broken_crown.description: Missing several jewels and tarnished with age.

lensing_crystal.description: A cracked lens that once belonged to a powerful magnifying glass.

broken_scepter.description: A broken scepter, its head shattered and its shaft cracked.

faded_tome.description: A faded tome with yellowed pages and a cracked spine.

dowsing_rod.description: A simple dowsing rod made of wood, used for locating water or minerals.

crystal_orb.description: A small crystalline sphere that glimmers faintly in the light.

jeweled_crown.description: A small crown adorned with semi-precious stones.

ancient_tome.description: An ancient tome filled with cryptic writings and illustrations.

priceless_painting.description: A priceless painting by a renowned artist, its value immeasurable.

royal_scepter.description: An ornate scepter once wielded by royalty, encrusted with jewels.

dragons_egg.description: A rare and valuable dragon's egg, warm to the touch.

ancient_crown.description: An ancient crown rumored to have belonged to a long-lost king.

sacred_idol.description: A sacred idol revered by an ancient civilization.

lost_tome.description: A lost tome containing forgotten knowledge and secrets.

fallen_star.description: A fragment of a fallen star, radiating a faint magical aura.

golden_idol.description: A small idol made of pure gold, intricately crafted.

crystal_eye.description: A mystical crystal eye that seems to watch those who hold it.

phoenix_feather.description: A rare feather from a phoenix, said to have healing properties.

kraken_claw.description: A massive claw from a kraken, still dripping with seawater.

divine_scepter.description: A scepter imbued with divine power, radiating holy energy.

jeweled_statue.description: A statue encrusted with precious jewels, depicting a legendary figure.

vial_of_phoenix_tears.description: A small vial containing the tears of a phoenix, known for their healing properties.

ancient_orrery.description: A complex orrery that models the movements of celestial bodies.

legendary: a legendary artifact of immense power
